Texts.Chs: 真正的科学家都拥有一个^orange;物质萃取器^reset;。它就像魔法一样！把某些东西放进去，就可以萃取出另外一些东西。你可以在你的^orange;物质汇编机^reset;里制造一个。
Texts.Eng: Any self-respecting scientist has an ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;. It's like sorcery! Stuff goes in, better stuff comes out! Make one in your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;物质萃取器^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Extraction Lab^reset; to the ^orange;Human Scientist^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 当涉及到使用这个东西的时候，你将会有无限的选择。现在你可以尝试去建造一些科学实验室了，例如一间^orange;生化试验台^reset;。
Texts.Eng: You'll have limitless options when it comes to using that thing. Try building some other science stations now, such as a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset;.
